extension.description: Features: - Panel, Horizontal, Vertical home views with two versions each. - Wall, Small list, Center List, Poster, Line views. - 1:1 realtime home design capability. Customized is at the top level, superb easy and fun! - RTL & LTR auto support mode. - Full mouse support. - AutoView support. - Choose any color for almost anything! (WIP) - Full save/load skin image. - Varied buttons and views effects. - Enchanced widget and network status. - Full genres support. - ExtendedInfo support (Movies/TV/Actors/Directors/AutoComplete..) - Some views have an additional special features. - Dynamic weather and widgets fanart (optional). - Interactive video window & OSD while navaigating. - Startup music and/or video (optional). - Smart subtitle module display current and history choosen subtitles, smart search and auto subs hosts finder.
